# Necesarry libraries

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

# Loading dataset

```{r}
dataset <- read_csv("preprocessed_data.csv")
```



```{r}
fit.reg = lm(BedroomAbvGr ~ SalePrice,data=dataset)

fit.reg$fitted.values

plot(dataset$BedroomAbvGr,dataset$SalePrice)
lines(dataset$BedroomAbvGr,fit.reg$fitted.values,col='red')
```
